WRITING.TITLE: Windows 10 DVD / ISO / USB ???
WRITING.TEXT: When will these be available as would prefer a straight clean install on multiple machines instead of upgrading ???
Are these things made in a studio or wind tunnel?

WRITING.TITLE: Why Joel McHale Is Even More Excited About The X-Files Revival Than You Are

WRITING.TEXT: The Freak's days are numbered, I'd love it if she was sent down for attempted murder, destination Wentworth and let the sparks fly
Bee as The Freak, mind blown

WRITING.TITLE: New Episode Themes
WRITING.TEXT: Which direction will the new episodes take then, will they go straight paranormal as that always worked, will it all be aliens, how about some spooky episodes with horror thrown in, will it be from canon or will it be new ideas, there has to be some bridging from the last films / series but instead of getting bogged down I think it's best to kind of forget some past events and tell new stories, that way it's not getting drawn back too much and will let the new stories shine

WRITING.TITLE: Character Synopsis
WRITING.TEXT:
Describe the characters in one word only...
Bruce = brooding / Gordon = liability / Bullock = grouchy / Alfred = fastidious / Nygma = riddles / Penguin = waddles / Ivy Pepper = prunes / Selena Kyle = climbs / Harvey Dent = flips / Fish Mooney = swims
It means fucked, screwed, done over
Nygma riddles, Penguin waddles, Bullock curses, Jim chases, Barbara exhales, Leslie dissects, Ivy prunes, Cat climbs, Alfred tuts, Bruce broods
And not forgetting throwing pencils at ceilings

WRITING.TITLE: Is Bullock Bollocksed?
WRITING.TEXT:
It seems he has a murky past, a dead end job, no missus and now Gordan taking the limelight
I wonder where Bullock is going, will he stay canon or will they throw in a newbie to complete him
Gordon has all the luck, drive and women just falling at his feet, Bullock is most definitely bollocksed
